column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I was going to go on a bike ride with a friend .
#id=2
#text=I pulled my bike out of the garage only to discover I had a flat tire .
#id=3
#text=I was n't sure if the flat was just from a slow leak or a bad tube .
#id=4
#text=If it was from a bad tube I would have to use tools to take the tire completely off .
#id=5
#text=Then I would have to replace the tube .
#id=6
#text=If it was just a slow leak I could just inflate the tire with my air pump and be on my way .
#id=7
#text=I decided to try the easy route first and inflated the tire with the pump .
#id=8
#text=It felt as if the tire was full and the problem was solved .
#id=9
#text=I took the bike for a test ride around the neighborhood just to be sure that it was fully inflated and would stay that way .
#text=It stayed inflated and I set off to meet with my friend .
